column5: Well, we';ve decided to rent a cottage for the first time, Stans Cottages on McPhee's Bay off of Nageek Lake, have never been to the area, let alone fished it, assuming worm harnesses and spinner baits would work well for this area. Headed there for Labour Day weekend  Hopefully get my soon to be 3y/o daughter hooked!

Worm harnesses and bottom bouncers will catch walleyes anywhere you use them !!! North south east or west !!! And the best part is bass pike & muskies even lake trout love them too !!!! Def take a few with you 1oz to 2oz bouncers & braid will cover you too about 30-35ft no problem ....
thank you.  the tricky part is we don't have any electronics, so will basically spotting things from the surface lol should be fun
